content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I understand you need electrical service. May I start by getting your name please?
Yeah, it's Linda. I’ve already told other companies what I need. Can you just hurry up?
Thanks, Linda. To check availability, could you please provide your service address?
I live at 99 Old Creek Road. But I don’t want some newbie showing up who charges a fortune for something simple.
Thank you for the address. Let me just verify that we cover your area and check schedule availability. One moment please.
Good news, we do serve your area. When is the best time for our technician to come by? We’ll try to work around your schedule.
Honestly, any time this week is too late. I want it done tomorrow morning. Will that be expensive? I’m on a fixed budget, you know.
I understand the urgency and budget concerns, Linda. I’m checking if we have openings for tomorrow morning now.
We do have slots tomorrow morning. Could you confirm the exact time you prefer? We want to accommodate your needs as best as possible.
Just around 9 AM. But I want to be sure about the price before you waste my time. Can you give me a ballpark figure without sending someone over? Last time someone came out and it was outrageous.
I can try to provide a price estimate based on the job description. Could you please describe the electrical issue in detail?
Look, it's a flickering light in my kitchen. Nothing fancy. It shouldn’t take long or cost a fortune. I don’t want extra charges popping up last minute like before.
Thank you, Linda. I will attempt to give an estimate based on a flickering kitchen light. One moment...
For flickering lights, we generally need to inspect onsite before giving a reliable estimate to avoid surprises. The technician can provide a firm quote once there. Does that sound acceptable?
I don’t want to waste my time if this is just going to be expensive again. If you can’t give me a price, I’m not booking. Why do I even bother?
I understand your frustration, Linda. I want to help you get this resolved affordably and quickly. If you prefer, I can escalate you to a human operator for further assistance.
reason: Customer prefers human help and price clarity
